Name: United Nations General Assembly Resolutions
Description: This is a collection of translated documents from the United Nations originally compiled into a translation memory by Alexandre Rafalovitch, Robert Dale
Paper Title: United Nations General Assembly Resolutions: A Six-Language Parallel Corpus
Affiliations: United Nations; Centre for Language Technology Macquarie University
Abstract:
In this paper we describe a six-ways parallel public-domain corpus consisting of 2100
United Nations General Assembly Resolutions with translations in the six official languages of the United Nations, with an average of around 3 million tokens per language. The corpus is available in a preprocessed, formatting-normalized TMX format with paragraphs aligned across multiple
languages. We describe the background to the
corpus and its content, the process of its construction, and some of its interesting properties.
